Package de.fu.junction.converter Description

“Java Functions missed” – Collection of useful functions such as S#implode(String, Object[])] (known from PHP).

Junction consists of classes which provide static methods and thereby act as some kind of function library. Besides the classes in the base package, there are the following sub-packages:

  • de.fu.junction.functional Useful functions and tools known from functional programming languages, such as the higher-order functions map and fold
  • de.fu.junction.converter Some classes for converting Strings into arbitrary datatypes, such as Date.
